ORIGIN_TYPES.title: Saiyan
ORIGIN_TYPES.description: A Race of space barbarians with the power to transform into Great Apes. Huge appetites.

ORIGIN_TYPES.title: Half Saiyan
ORIGIN_TYPES.description: The result of a human and a saiyan, boasting many of the same strengths as a saiyan but with interest in battle. Huge Appetites.

ORIGIN_TYPES.title: Namekian
ORIGIN_TYPES.description: Humanoids with plant and slug-like characteristics, including green skin and antennae. Can survive on only water.

ARCHETYPE_TYPES.title: Warrior
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.description: The battle hungry archetype geared for high intensity combat.

ARCHETYPE_TYPES.title: Support
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.description: The comic relief archetype, helpful distractions and buff to the party.

ARCHETYPE_TYPES.title: Striker
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.description: An archetype capable of altering the battlefield and negating villains abilities.

ARCHETYPE_TYPES.title: Tank
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.description: The sturdiest archetype, capable of absorbing large amounts of damage, regenerating from it or saving others.

MOVE_TYPES.title: Kamehameha
MOVE_TYPES.description: An energy wave. The signature attack of the students of the Turtle School.

MOVE_TYPES.title: Special Beam Cannon
MOVE_TYPES.description: A concentrated beam attack that takes a long time to charge.

MOVE_TYPES.title: Taunt
MOVE_TYPES.description: Making a funny face and a rude noise, draws the attention of the target.

MOVE_TYPES.title: Spirit Bomb
MOVE_TYPES.description: Takes a while to charge up but then unleashes a powerful attack

MOVE_TYPES.title: Blast Barrage
MOVE_TYPES.description: Unleash a barrage of energy blasts at the opponent

MOVE_TYPES.title: Light Grenade
MOVE_TYPES.description: Fire an explosive energy ball at the target

MOVE_TYPES.title: Super Explosive Wave
MOVE_TYPES.description: Attack all enemies with an explosive wave.

MOVE_TYPES.title: Tri Beam
MOVE_TYPES.description: An energy beam fired in the shape of a triangle

MOVE_TYPES.title: Solar Flare
MOVE_TYPES.description: Emit a blinding light infront of self to blind a target at close range

MOVE_TYPES.title: Evil Containment Wave
MOVE_TYPES.description: attempt to capture an opponent inside of a container

MOVE_TYPES.title: Scatter Energy Wave
MOVE_TYPES.description: Fire an energy wave that surprises the enemy by splitting apart into several projectiles

MOVE_TYPES.title: Destructo-Disc
MOVE_TYPES.description: Release an energy disc capable of cutting anything at the opponent

MOVE_TYPES.title: Y-Yajirobe?!
MOVE_TYPES.description: Yajirobe springs into action attack at the most opportune, least risky time for a devastating strike.

MOVE_TYPES.title: Wolf Fang Fist
MOVE_TYPES.description: Embody a fierce wolf and unleash a barrage of strikes

MOVE_TYPES.title: Spriti Ball
MOVE_TYPES.description: An ball of energy the user has complete control over.

MOVE_TYPES.title: Neo Wolf Fang Fist
MOVE_TYPES.description: Ultimate version of wolf fang fist

FORM_TYPES.title: Great Ape
FORM_TYPES.description: A Saiyan or Half Saiyan tranforms during a full moon or similar conditions, Becoming the great Ape. This power is saved for particularly difficult to conquer planets.

FORM_TYPES.title: Super Saiyan
FORM_TYPES.description: A Saiyan or Half Saiyan becomes a Super Saiyan. Their power is amplified many times over, their eyes become teal and their hair a spiky gold.

FORM_TYPES.title: Potential Unlocked
FORM_TYPES.description: Granted by an Elder Guru a characters latent ability is unlocked.

ITEM_TYPES.title: Scouter
ITEM_TYPES.description: A device worn on the head used to identify power levels, notoriously faulty.

ITEM_TYPES.title: Senzu Bean
ITEM_TYPES.description: Revitalized the character that consumes it.

ITEM_TYPES.title: Turtle Hermit Gi
ITEM_TYPES.description: Uniform worn by the turtle school.

ITEM_TYPES.title: Power Pole
ITEM_TYPES.description: A pole capable of extending to great lengths.
